bgu.dcr.az.api.exen

Interface Experiment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Process, java.lang.Runnable

    public interface Experiment
extends Process
    expirement is executeable collection of predefined tests the expirement responsible to configure its sub executions based on its loaded tests and analyzed their statistics via the statistics analayzers defined in the test
